ygData.subject: Re: Best 1h blunt weapon...
ygData.msgSnippet: The screaming mace quest is done completely in Crushbone, not Cazic Thule. The quest can also be done in a full group of level 15ish people. Cazic Thule
ygData.messageBody:
The screaming mace quest is done completely in Crushbone, not Cazic Thule.
The quest can also be done in a full group of level 15ish people.

Cazic Thule doesn't have quests to my knowledge. Its a dungeon full of VERY
mean lizards....and I don't suggest anyone to go in there until they are in
their 20s.

Lana


----Original Message Follows----
From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...
Date: Mon, 16 Aug 1999 11:22:22 EDT

From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>

Have you tried the Screaming Mace? I think it's a quest in Cazic Thul
<--yeah I can't spell) that's abuot lvl 35ish. So, if you ahve a friend, or
care to buy one. it's 8 DMG 35 Delay (if I remember correctly) and casts
Yeulp (again can't spell) randomly on you.

That's the best one I know of, but there's probably better cause otherwise
you'd use the same weapon from lvl 35-50 and that'd suck.

>Can anyone tell me what the best 1h blunt weapon is in the game and were I
>can find it. I'm a 17 level cleric and it just seems like there are no
>good weapons that I can use at my current level.
